summary: Project includes policy content updates and STYO brand asset implementation (Tech Neon primary logo) plus a modular SVG-based trust badge system for verified/premium labeling, optimized for dark UI, web performance, and mobile responsiveness.
architectural_notes: Use SVG-first approach for logo and badge components to ensure scalability and dark-UI optimization.
Badge system should be implemented as reusable, dynamically attachable UI components with an extensible style/token structure for future variants.
Optimize brand assets for performance (lightweight SVGs, responsive sizing, suitable for favicon/app icon use).
imageRequirements:

existing_features.title: Generate and add the official STYO primary logo assets using the “Tech Neon” direction: clean modern scalable SVG with a blue-to-purple gradient, subtle depth (not heavy 3D), optimized for dark UI, high contrast, and lightweight for web performance. Deliver full logo (icon + “STYO” text), icon-only, and white monochrome versions, each provided as SVG and transparent PNG.

Update the app to consistently use the new Tech Neon STYO logo assets in existing UI entry points: header brand image, footer brand image, and SEO/social metadata assets. Replace current references to /assets/generated/styo-logo-transparent.dim_200x80.png with the new full-logo asset, and update favicon usage to the new icon-only asset.

Implement a reusable SVG-based Gold “Verified” trust badge component (inspired by the gold D concept) with a clean gold gradient, subtle glow (not flashy), and web-performance-friendly SVG markup. The component must be reusable and accept props to support future badge variants (Featured with purple glow tag, Premium with gold outline, Elite with diamond style) without requiring a rewrite.

Attach the new Gold “Verified” badge component to listings in the UI in a way that is dynamically driven by listing data. Specifically, replace the current “Verified” pill/badge rendering in listing cards with the new SVG badge when listing.verified is true, while keeping layout mobile-responsive and not regressing performance.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Refund Policy section text and heading to “Refund Policy – ₹99 Unlock Fee” with bullet-point eligible refund cases; remove “non-refundable under any circumstances” line
Implement STYO primary logo (Tech Neon blue–purple gradient) as clean, modern, scalable SVG optimized for dark UI; deliver full logo (icon+text), icon-only, and white monochrome versions
Provide logo assets as transparent PNG + SVG for full logo and variants (including favicon/app icon icon-only)
Create reusable Gold “Verified” trust badge SVG component with premium gold gradient and subtle glow; dynamically attachable to listings for Verified Listings/Owners/Premium Properties
Design badge system to be modular/extensible for future tags (Featured purple glow, Premium gold outline, Elite diamond style) with web/mobile performance optimization
